text: Bobby Dan Dillon (February 23, 1930 â€“ August 22, 2019) was an American football defensive back. He played for the Green Bay Packers from 1952 through 1959. Dillon was born in Temple, Texas. In 2011, the Professional Football Researchers Association named Dillon to the PRFA Hall of Very Good Class of 2011. Dillon died on August 22, 2019 in Temple at the age of 89. ==References== ==Other websites== *Bobby Dillon stats at Pro-football- reference.com Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American football cornerbacks Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:People from Temple, Texas
title: Bobby Dillon
